description: This spreadsheet contains prime awards created through the Oregon Recovery and Reinvestment Act (ARRA). Please note that these are preliminary data reflected from the most recent reporting period of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009, including data through April 30, 2011. For the latest recovery award data, please visit http://www.recovery.gov.

metadata.attribution: State of Oregon Economic Recovery Executive Team (ERET)

name: Oregon Recovery and Reinvestment Act Data (Prime Awards) - March, 2012
